name: Saving Dolores
description:
Saving Dolores is a survival horror game that look and feel like Hotline Miami met Resident Evil.

The game action is about avoiding being attacked by zombies using only a hammer and all the wood you could find in your house.  What is the purpose of a chair during a zombie apocalypse, right? Yeah, you can also use your hammer to defend yourself, but with a horde like that you better keep distance!

Dolores is a small town of brave people trying to survive a virus outbreak which is turning people into brainless and dangerous creatures, as known as zombies.

Little they know about what was actually going on, untill a local radio announce the news: a brilliant scientist from the capital is coming to spray a new drug over the city and save the people from the horde.

Locked into their own houses, the people of Dolores are trying to survive gaining time by using their own stuff to build barricades and keep those walkers away from their houses.

Are you up to help dolorians save themselves?
